title: [Medicine] One in 5 patients exhibit cognitive impairment several months after COVID-19 diagnosis: 'People should be aware that there are many post-acute complications of COVID-19, including post-COVID syndrome â€” which can be debilitating'

[Social Science] A study published in the journal Risk Analysis suggests that people who embrace the ideologies of libertarianism and anti-egalitarianism are more likely to disregard the risks of COVID-19 and oppose government actions
